contents: 3. fol. 43b-47b: Risālah fī taḥqīq al-mabāḥith al-wujūdīyah wa-al-maqāṣid al-uṣūlīyah.
4. fol. 47b-49b and 62b-64b: Risālah fī taḥqīq anna mā yaṣduru [ʻanhu taʻālá innamā] bi-al-qudrah wa-al-ikhtiyār.
6. fol. 64b-72b: Risālah fī taḥqīq anna al-taʻrīf yuqṣadu bi-hi muʻayyan ʻinda al-sāmiʻ.
7. fol. 75b-79b: Risālah fī taḥqīq al-samāʻ ʻalá qānūn al-ʻaql.
8. fol. 85b-119a: Mawrid al-rawī fī al-mawlid al-nabawī.
9. fol. 121a-160b: Nuzʹhat al-khāṭir al-fātir fī tarjamat al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir.
10. fol. 161a-162b: Risālah fī dukhūl walad al-bint fī al-mawqūf.
11. fol. 163b-201b: Risālah fī radd qidam al-ʻālam.
14. fol. 229b-241a: Laḥn al-ʻawāmm fīmā yatʻallaqu bi-ʻilm al-kalām.
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
